headline: Northrop Grumman (NYSE:NOC) Declares New Quarterly Dividend of US$2 Per Share
summary: Northrop Grumman's (NYSE:NOC) announcement of a quarterly dividend increase to $2.31 reflects its focus on returning value to shareholders. Over the last quarter, Northrop Grumman's share price rose by nearly 10%, a move possibly reinforced by the market's slight uptick and strengthened by strategic corporate actions, such as share buybacks and dividend enhancements. While broader market indices like the S&P 500 remained relatively flat over the week but up 11% for the year, Northrop...

headline: Northrop Grumman Rewards Shareholders With 12% Dividend Hike
summary: NOC announces that its management has approved a 12.1% hike in its quarterly dividend to $2.31 per share.

headline: RTX's Arm Wins a $1B Contract to Aid Standard Missile-3 Program
summary: RTX's unit, Raytheon, secures a $1 billion contract to produce and deliver up to 55 SM-3 Block IB All-Up Rounds.

raw.headline: RTX's Arm Wins a $1B Contract to Aid Standard Missile-3 Program

headline: Northrop Grumman to Participate in Bernstein’s 41st Annual Strategic Decisions Conference
summary: FALLS CHURCH, Va., May 21, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Northrop Grumman Corporation (NYSE: NOC) will participate in Bernstein’s 41st Annual Strategic Decisions Conference on Wednesday, May 28. Kathy Warden, chair, chief executive officer and president, will present beginning at 10:00 a.m. Eastern time. The presentation will be webcast live at http://investor.northropgrumman.com. headline: Northrop Grumman Corporation (NOC) Boosts Quarterly Dividend by 12.1%
summary: On May 20, Northrop Grumman Corporation (NYSE:NOC) declared that it is increasing its quarterly dividend by 12.1% to $2.31 per share. Northrop Grumman Corporation (NYSE:NOC) is an American multinational aerospace and defense company. It engages in various operations, including the design and production of both manned and unmanned aircraft, weapons, missile systems, sensors, and naval […]
